Earthquake activity:

Fort Myers Shores-area historical earthquake activity is above Florida state average. It is 93% smaller than the overall U.S. average.

On 9/10/2006 at 14:56:08, a magnitude 5.9 (5.9 MB, 5.5 MS, 5.8 MW, Class: Moderate, Intensity: VI - VII) earthquake occurred 304.5 miles away from Fort Myers Shores center

On 3/31/1992 at 14:59:39, a magnitude 3.8 (3.8 MB, Depth: 3.1 mi, Class: Light, Intensity: II - III) earthquake occurred 252.0 miles away from Fort Myers Shores center

On 6/23/2016 at 17:20:29, a magnitude 3.8 (3.8 ML) earthquake occurred 266.4 miles away from Fort Myers Shores center

On 9/21/2016 at 16:30:52, a magnitude 3.8 (3.8 ML) earthquake occurred 269.3 miles away from Fort Myers Shores center

On 9/4/2016 at 18:29:29, a magnitude 3.8 (3.8 ML) earthquake occurred 269.4 miles away from Fort Myers Shores center

On 7/16/2016 at 20:00:10, a magnitude 3.7 (3.7 MB) earthquake occurred 253.5 miles away from the city center

Magnitude types: body-wave magnitude (MB), local magnitude (ML), surface-wave magnitude (MS), moment magnitude (MW)
